description: ADORABLE ZOO ANIMALS YOU CAN BEND AND TWIST AWAY

Bend them. Twist them. Contort the limbs whichever way you like. These 4” zoo animals are more than happy to do your bendable bidding! We’ve designed them using flexible plastic that makes for fantastic fun. They’re great for keeping little ones occupied, can be used as a unique fidget toy, and come in an assorted bright colors just about anyone will love.

Whether you’re looking for party favors for your little one’s birthday party, unique party supplies, prizes for that kids’ carnival or contest, or just a cool gift to make your cutie pie’s day, these bendable zoo animals are guaranteed to be a hit! Every set comes with 12 toys backed by a 100% money-back guarantee to give you total peace of mind. Inspire a rush of smiles and giggles without having anything to lose.
Here’s why you’ll love these bendable toys:
- Come 12 in a set to give you great value.
- Can be bent and twisted over and over again.
- Fun stress relief fidget toy for kids and adults.
- Make exciting party favors for boys and girls ages 3+
- Backed by a no-hassle, 100% money-back guarantee.
